casebody.data:
First Department,

August, 1973

(August 2, 1973) In the Matter of Robert Bloom, Petitioner.

Motion for enlargement of time denied, and the appeal dismissed, sua sponte, on the ground that the appeal was improper and that the proper procedure is review under CPLR article 78 (Judiciary Law, § 755). Order filed. Concur — Stevens, P. J., Markewich, Kupferman, Murphy and Tilzer, JJ:
